original_text: And Jesus in pity touched their eyes, and immediately they recovered their sight and followed him.
korean_text: 예수께서 불쌍히 여기사 그들의 눈을 만지시니 곧 보게 되어 그들이 예수를 따르니라

sentences.original_text: And Jesus in pity touched their eyes
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님께서 불쌍히 여기사 그들의 눈을 만지시니

sentences.original_text: and immediately they recovered their sight
